meta.title: About Us | Stratos
meta.description: Learn about Stratos: a social e-commerce and messaging platform built for the world.

hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: We are building a new generation digital platform for the world

intro.paragraph1: We are building a new generation digital platform for the world, where social networking, content, commerce, and communication are no longer fragmented.
intro.paragraph2: We believe that truly valuable connections begin with trust between people, extend to content resonance, and ultimately transform into sustainable business relationships.

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.description: We are an international social + e-commerce + instant messaging platform. Users can discover content, build relationships, communicate in real-time, and naturally complete transactions here.
whoWeAre.point1: Social is not just interaction, but the building of long-term relationships
whoWeAre.point2: Content is not just expression, but the transmission of value
whoWeAre.point3: E-commerce is not just buying and selling, but the result of trust
whoWeAre.point4: Instant messaging is not an accessory feature, but the core link that connects everything

problemsWeSolve.title: What Problems Are We Solving
problemsWeSolve.problem1: In today's internet world, social platforms excel at creating interactions but struggle to handle transactions;
problemsWeSolve.problem2: E-commerce platforms efficiently complete transactions but lack genuine relationships;
problemsWeSolve.problem3: Instant messaging tools connect people but remain outside the business ecosystem.
problemsWeSolve.solution: We seek to break down these boundaries.
problemsWeSolve.point1: Discover products within genuine social relationships
problemsWeSolve.point2: Form purchase decisions through content and discussion
problemsWeSolve.point3: Complete trust building and transaction closure through instant communication

platformPhilosophy.title: Our Platform Philosophy
platformPhilosophy.description: People-centered, not traffic-centered. We respect the differences in languages, cultures, and markets. The platform has been designed for internationalization from the start, supporting users from different regions, languages, and usage habits to connect freely.
platformPhilosophy.point2: Ordinary users participate in commercial value through social networking
platformPhilosophy.point3: Sellers acquire users through genuine relationships rather than advertisements
platformPhilosophy.footer: Every interaction can create new value.

ourVision.title: What We Hope to Become
ourVision.description: We are not just a platform, but a digital community that transcends languages and regions.
ourVision.footer1: And gain long-term returns from it
ourVision.footer2: This is a shared space belonging to users, creators, and merchants.

weAreMovingForward.title: We Are Moving Forward
weAreMovingForward.description: We are still continuously iterating and growing, but the direction is always clear: make social networking more authentic, make e-commerce more trustworthy, and make connections more valuable.

meta.title: Help & Support | Stratos
meta.description: Get help and contact support for Stratos.

help.subtitle: Help & Customer Service
help.intro: If you have any questions or need assistance, please contact us through the following channels.
help.policiesIntro: Privacy, deposit, seller, subscription, affiliate, and tipping policies are linked below.
help.faqPlaceholder: We are compiling a FAQ. Stay tuned.
help.contactIntro: If you need help, please contact us through the in-app support ticket system. You can find "Support Tickets" under "More" in the menu, or use the buttons below.

meta.title: Privacy Policy | Stratos
meta.description: Stratos privacy policy: how we collect, use, and protect your information.

privacy.intro: Stratos is a platform combining social, e-commerce, and messaging. We take your privacy seriously. This policy describes how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information and what rights you have.
privacy.collectContent: We collect information you provide and data generated through use of our services, including: account and authentication (e.g. email, third-party login identifiers); profile (display name, avatar, bio, contact and shipping addresses); social and content (posts, comments, likes, follows, direct and group messages); transactions and fulfillment (orders, payment records, shipping, disputes and reviews); seller/affiliate data (store policies, payment account details, deposits, commissions and subscriptions); support (ticket content and communications); device and logs (IP, browser type, access times, for security and operations). Payment details are processed by licensed providers (e.g. Stripe, PayPal, Alipay, WeChat Pay); we only store transaction outcomes and necessary identifiers.
privacy.useContent: We use this information to: provide, maintain and improve our services (auth, profiles, feed, messaging, marketplace, orders and payments); process subscriptions, deposits, commissions and tips; perform contracts, handle disputes and support; send important notices and compliance-related communications; ensure security and prevent fraud and abuse; comply with legal obligations; and, where you consent or law permits, analytics and product improvement. We do not use your data for unrelated marketing without your consent.
privacy.protectContent: We use technical and organizational measures to protect your data (e.g. encryption in transit and at rest, access controls, audits). Data is stored by us and our chosen providers (e.g. Supabase, payment providers) in compliant jurisdictions. We retain data only as long as needed for the service, legal obligations, or your consent; thereafter we delete or anonymize.
privacy.thirdPartyContent: To provide the service we use third parties: authentication and database (e.g. Supabase), payment processing (Stripe, PayPal, Alipay, WeChat Pay, etc.), and cloud infrastructure. They have their own privacy policies and may store data in their server locations. By using Stratos you acknowledge and accept such transfers and processing.
privacy.cookiesContent: We use cookies and similar technologies to maintain sessions, remember preferences, secure the service, and analyze usage. You can manage cookies in your browser; disabling essential cookies may affect some features.
privacy.rightsContent: Under applicable law you may have rights to access, correct, delete, port, restrict or object to processing of your data; where we rely on consent you may withdraw it. You can manage some data in account settings; for other requests use support tickets or the contact details at the end of this policy. We will respond within legally required timeframes.
privacy.contactContent: For questions or requests about this policy or your data, please submit a ticket via the in-app Help page or use our published contact details.

purpose.title: Purpose of Deposit
purpose.content: The deposit system protects buyer rights. When a seller's "unfilled order total" (sum of paid orders that are pending, paid, or shipped and not yet completed or refunded) exceeds the free deposit credit of their current seller subscription tier, additional deposit is required to ensure order commitments can be fulfilled.

subscription.title: Subscription Tiers and Free Deposit Credit
subscription.content: Your seller subscription monthly fee equals the free deposit credit for that tier. Higher tiers provide a higher credit and thus a higher cap on unfilled order total. Tiers are quoted in USD; other currencies are converted for display.
subscription.tiers: Subscription tiers (monthly fee = free deposit credit):

trigger.title: When Deposit Is Required
trigger.content: When your unfilled order total exceeds the free deposit credit for your current seller tier, the system will require you to pay additional deposit. Until paid, you may be unable to accept new orders or have limited selling functionality.
trigger.formulaDetail: Required deposit = Unfilled order total − Subscription tier (free deposit credit)

status.title: Deposit Statuses
status.requiredDesc: Deposit payment is required. Please pay as soon as possible to restore or maintain product sales functionality.
status.heldDesc: This deposit has been paid and is held by the platform. Your sales functionality is active. It may become refundable once your unfilled order total drops below your tier and related orders are completed.
status.refundableDesc: Refund conditions are met and the cooling-off period (about 3 calendar days after conditions were met) has passed. You can submit a refund request from the "refundable date." Processing usually takes 3–5 business days; the received amount may be less due to payment channel fees.
status.refundingDesc: Your refund request is being processed; it typically completes within 3–5 business days.
status.refundedDesc: This deposit has been refunded to your payment account (fees may have been deducted).
status.forfeitedDesc: This deposit was deducted under platform rules, e.g. to compensate buyers in disputes where the seller was at fault, for violation penalties, or for debt recovery.

refund.title: Refund Rules
refund.content: When your unfilled order total drops below your current tier and all orders tied to this deposit are completed or refunded, the system will mark this lot as "refundable" and set a "refundable date" about 3 calendar days later. After that date you may submit a refund request; once approved, refunds are processed within about 3–5 business days.
refund.note: Payment channel fees (e.g. Stripe ~2.9% + $0.30) may be deducted; the amount you receive may be less than the original deposit.

upgrade.title: Subscription Upgrade Recommendation
upgrade.content: If you frequently need to pay additional deposits, consider upgrading to a higher subscription tier. Higher tiers provide larger free deposit credit, reducing the frequency of additional deposit payments.

pay.title: Pay Deposit

noDeposit.title: No Deposit Required
noDeposit.description: Your current unfilled order total does not exceed the subscription tier. No additional deposit is required.

pay.warning: After paying the deposit, your product sales functionality will be restored immediately. Deposit can be refunded after orders are completed.

welcome.title: Welcome to Stratos!
welcome.description: We are an integrated platform combining social networking, e-commerce, and instant messaging. Let's explore the powerful features together.

discover.title: Discover Great Content
discover.description: Browse and discover interesting content on the homepage. Follow users you're interested in, like, comment and share to interact with others.

create.title: Create Your Content
create.description: Create and share your thoughts, images, and videos. Use topic tags to help more people discover your content.

shop.title: Browse Marketplace
shop.description: Discover featured products in the marketplace. Find products within genuine social relationships and make purchase decisions through content discussion.

message.title: Instant Messaging
message.description: Chat with friends in real-time and build genuine social relationships. Complete trust building and transaction closure through instant communication.

seller.title: Start Selling
seller.description: Create your first product and start selling online. Once you become a seller, you can manage products and orders in the seller center.

affiliate.title: Start Promoting
affiliate.description: Choose products to promote and earn commissions. Once you become an affiliate, you can view earnings and statistics in the affiliate center.

policies.intro: Below is a summary of Stratos platform policies and rules. The full text of each policy applies.
policies.sellerIntro: By opening a store, listing products, and accepting orders on Stratos, you agree to these platform seller rules.
policies.sellerWho: Eligibility and subscription: Sellers must have a verified account and an active seller subscription (tiers $5 / $15 / $40 / $80 / $200 per month, each tier providing the same amount as free deposit credit). Lapsed subscription may affect order acceptance and selling features.
policies.sellerDeposit: Deposit: When your unfilled order total exceeds the free deposit credit for your tier, additional deposit is required; see the Deposit Policy. Deposit may be deducted for dispute compensation, violation penalties, or debt recovery.
policies.sellerConduct: Conduct and prohibited items: Do not list illegal, infringing, fraudulent, or prohibited items; describe products accurately and fulfill orders on time. Violations may lead to removal, deductions, restrictions, or account action.
policies.sellerDisputes: Disputes and after-sales: Order disputes are resolved per platform rules; if the seller is at fault, we may deduct compensation from deposit or future payouts. Keep proof of shipment and communications.
policies.sellerPayouts: Payments and payouts: Sellers must bind and maintain valid payment accounts; settlement and withdrawal terms are as published by the platform and payment providers.
policies.subscriptionIntro: Stratos offers seller, affiliate, and tip subscriptions, each billed monthly.
policies.subscriptionSeller: Seller subscription: Monthly tiers $5 / $15 / $40 / $80 / $200 (USD), each tier’s fee equals its free deposit credit; multi-currency display and payment supported. Renewal is automatic at the current tier; you may upgrade, downgrade, or cancel in Subscription management. After canceling, access continues until the end of the current billing period.
policies.subscriptionAffiliate: Affiliate subscription: $4.99/month (USD). Enables you to promote affiliate-enabled products and earn commissions; no new commissions if subscription lapses.
policies.subscriptionTip: Tip subscription: $4.99/month (USD). Enables your profile to receive tips; the tip option is disabled if the subscription lapses.
policies.subscriptionRenewal: Renewal and cancellation: Subscriptions renew by default; cancellation stops the next cycle. Fees paid are generally non-refundable unless required by law or stated by the platform.
policies.affiliateIntro: The affiliate feature lets you earn commissions by promoting seller products.
policies.affiliateEligibility: Eligibility: You must have an active affiliate subscription ($4.99/month). You may only promote products that have affiliate enabled and that you have selected.
policies.affiliateCommission: Commission: Rates are set by the seller per product. When an order is completed (or meets platform settlement rules) through your link/post, commission is settled per policy. The platform may deduct fees or taxes as applicable.
policies.affiliateContent: Content: Promotional posts and materials must be truthful and lawful; no misleading or false claims. Violations may result in removal or restricted access.
policies.affiliatePayouts: Settlement and payouts: Commissions are paid when conditions are met, per platform and payment provider rules; cycles and methods are as published.
policies.tipIntro: The tipping feature allows users to send money to creators who have enabled tipping.
policies.tipEligibility: Eligibility: Recipients must have an active tip subscription ($4.99/month). When active, the profile shows a tip option.
policies.tipUsage: Usage: Tips are voluntary gifts; amounts are processed by the platform and payment providers; after applicable fees, the remainder is settled to the recipient.
policies.tipConduct: Conduct: Do not use tipping for fraud, money laundering, or illegal activity; violations may lead to feature disable or account action.

metadata.title: Stratos - Social E-commerce Platform
metadata.description: An integrated platform combining social networking, e-commerce, and instant messaging
